fullText: Geoffrey Rush gives a masterful performance as the dying monarch in this absurdist masterpiece, transforming Ionesco's philosophical meditation on mortality into riveting theater.
dtliExcerpt: Geoffrey Rush gives a masterful performance as the dying monarch in this absurdist masterpiece, transforming Ionesco's philosophical meditation on mortality into riveting theater.
